section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition to announce in Colorado against Nunez and it appeared after the oral argument that the judgment of the court below had relied on an independent state grounds.
And accordingly, the writ is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justice White has filed a concurring opinion in which Justice O'Connor and I have joined. Justice Stevens has filed a concurring opinion.
